Articles.Content:
More just putting this here as something that might need attention for 1.2 a few of us have noticed that anything placed on an incline (in this case Eve) will start to slide regardless of landing gear state or resting on structural parts.

i have no screen shots of this but we were discussing this in the "what have you done in ksp today" thread page 1013, 1014. 

Hopefully not reposting the same point!
